name: Deep Voyage
description: Help beautiful mermaid to win a royal garden design competition in Underwater Kingdom. Complete exciting levels, solve puzzles and make your sea-garden perfect. Truly marvelous collapse game with more than 200 levels full of fun.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
